DOC.brief_summary: Prospective study conduct 150 woman polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) randomly divide 3 group : group I ( 50 woman ) receive clomiphene citrate ( CC ) 50 mg orally every 8 hour start cycle day 3 5 day , group II ( 50 woman ) receive 2mg estradiol valerate daily cycle day 7 - 11 addition CC group III ( 50 woman ) receive phytoestrogen ( 20mg cimifuga racemosa day 1- 12 ) addition CC .
DOC.brief_title: Phytoestrogens Alternative Estradiol Ovulation Induction PCOS
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective study conduct 150 woman PCOS randomly divide 3 group : group I ( 50 woman ) receive CC only50 mg orally every 8 hour start cycle day 3 5 day , group II ( 50 woman ) receive 2mg estradiol valerate daily cycle day 7 - 11 addition CC group III ( 50 woman ) receive phytoestrogen ( 20mg cimifuga racemosa day 1- 12 ) addition CC .
DOC.criteria: Women 1ry 2ry infertility include . All woman 20 37 year old . woman endocrinological abnormality thyroid dysfunction abnormal prolactin level , hypothalamic pituitary dysfunction evaluate low gonadotropin level , cause infertility tubal factor evaluate HSG laparoscopy , abnormal uterine cavity evaluate sonohystrography hysteroscopy male factor evaluate semen analysis . Women ovarian cyst also exclude study
